strapiPost.title: Electric Mode
strapiPost.content:
Northwest Arkansas is about to be home to another major expansion. 

  • Moving in: Electric vehicle company, Canoo, has decided to place its corporate headquarters and advanced industrialization facility in Bentonville. It also has plans for a research and development center in Fayetteville. 
  • One step at a time: Canoo was established in 2017 and is currently thriving in multiple states. The company has designed vehicles that are purpose-built and customizable to any consumer. Canooâ€™s vision is that one day everyone would have an electric vehicle. Who knows? NWA might be the place that makes it possible. 

Read the Talk Business & Politics story HERE.
